name: gVision
author: Ilya Lopukhin
legalhint: This plugin enables you to bulk process images with the Google Vision services. You need a free account on plugins.deskfiler.org for it AND we will give you a few cents for free to test it!

children.name: saveLabelInfo
children.label: Save "label" information in images headers, where possible (EXIF)?

children.name: copyTaggedToExtraFolder
children.label: Copy tagged images to extra folder?

children.name: saveToJson
children.label: Save extensive data in extra file (image-name.json)?

children.name: certaintyLevel
children.label: Certainty level before a label is accepted
